title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: South Korea's top nuclear envoy Lee Do-hoon says,. he will meet his American counterpart, Stephen Biegun, this week to discuss ways to continue the momentum for talks between North Korea and the United States.Speaking to reporters upon his arrival in Washington on Monday,Lee said, that Seoul-Washington coordination is crucial if they're going to find a solution to the nuclear impasse.Although last weekend's working-level denuclearization talks in Stockholm broke down, the South Korean envoy insisted North Korea and the U.S. left room for future dialogue.He will also meet his Japanese counterpart during his four-day stay in Washington.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
